subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: At the 24 Hours of Rapelje, an endurance race sanctioned by USA Cycling, in which mountain bike riders compete to see who can ride the farthest in 24 hours,  I was lapped for the first time in my life.
snippet: At the 24 Hours of Rapelje, an endurance race sanctioned by USA Cycling, in which mountain bike riders compete to see who can ride the farthest in 24 hours,  I was lapped for the first time in my life.
